1.title: Soñar
1.plot: Mexican star Andrés arrives in Spain to help the once great Betis football club. Spanish midfielder Saúl is on the brink of stardom in Atlético, while Argentinian Berizzo brings his human touch to manage the squad in Seville. Striker Iñaki lends his speed to the Basque-only club, Bilbao, while Sports Director Quique hopes for early triumph for newcomer Girona. In tiny but fierce Eibar, president Amaia keeps her calm over early setbacks.

2.title: Los pies en la Tierra
2.plot: Support floods in for Berizzo amidst his shocking news, while Amaia keeps en eye on the future as her team starts to succeed. Risk of injury lurks as Andrés leads on the pitch. Saúl learns from his hero Fernando Torres, while Iñaki's mother helps him though a bad run. Seville lurches from disaster to euphoria and back again. Quique suffers when Girona visits Eibar. In Sevilla, the crisis claims a victim.

3.title: Familia
3.plot: The Derby between arch rivals Betis and Seville has never been more intense. Amidst rising hopes, Quique works with his coach to find further success. Saul grows into his role. Iñaki performs at a crucial time for the club, and cements his future. Andrés keeps faith as injury concerns grow. Amaia welcomes a new player to the family. Last minute negotiations become emotional turning points as the contracts are signed.

4.title: Saber perder
4.plot: Iñaki and the team navigate through hopes and fears in the European League. The Mexican national coach visits Andrés to discuss the World Cup. Amaia keeps her cool during a frustrating match against Barcelona. Saul's hopes for Champions League suffers when Messi tips the scales. Quique's team faces a difficult challenge on the pitch. Violent Russian fans cause a tragedy in Bilbao.

5.title: Ofertas Irrechazables
5.plot: Quique is in tough negotiations with his friend, Girona's successful coach. Will friendship outweigh business? Saul's perfectionist streak goes on display. Amaia hosts the European champions with surprising results. Betis are on the verge of one of their best season in years, but Bilbao, one of their worst. The mystery over the Japanese star is resolved.

6.title: Decir Adiós
6.plot: Andrés manages injury risk with his coach, while keeping focus on the World Cup. After another miracle season, Amaia has one last hurdle to secure Eibar's future. Saul pays homage to his hero, as Atlético celebrates in Europe. Iñaki wins the admiration of one of his heroes. Emotions run high as some people stay, and some move on. Surprises in Seville and Bilbao bring the story full circle.

imdb.plot outline: For the first time ever, Amazon presents an unprecedented journey into the behind the scenes, real life look into the Spanish Football League (La Liga) through the perspective of six individuals. Witness as a team president, coach, sports director and athletes struggle and thrive against the pressures of the sport within their respective organizations. With exclusive access to the day-to-day activities on and off the pitch, we follow our characters into never before seen back-office negotiations, locker room briefings, and intimate moments at home with family, discovering what it takes to succeed in one of the most competitive leagues in the world.
imdb.title: Six Dreams

Witness as a team president, coach, sports director and athletes struggle and thrive against the pressures of the sport within their respective organizations. With exclusive access to the day-to-day activities on and off the pitch, we follow our characters into never before seen back-office negotiations, locker room briefings, and intimate moments at home with family, discovering what it takes to succeed in one of the most competitive leagues in the world.This show is a documentary and presents the content as it was originally captured; viewer discretion is advised. Views featured do not represent Amazon's perspectives.
